item.description:
Let's try Chardonnay's in Seekonk as the location for the next Rhode Island Atheist Society Happy Hour. They have a fairly extensive Happy Hour menu and good reviews. Please see their website for more specifics: http://www.chardonnay...

Come out for good food, drinks and great conversation with fellow members of the Rhode Island Atheist Society! Hope to see you there!
item.how_to_find_us: We will meet in the bar area.
item.name: Rhode Island Atheist Society Happy Hour(s) - Chardonnay's in Seekonk
